overview: Thoracic malignancies: mesothelioma, thymoma, non-small cell lung cancer, small cell lung cancer
research_interests:
Dr. Tanvetyanon focuses his research on health outcomes and survival analysis. He has published over 100 articles in biomedical journals. 
  *
